articles.title: DCF releases new details about its involvement with Conn. girl found dead in storage container
articles.description:
“To correct misinformation,” DCF released a timeline of their involvement with Jacqueline “Mimi” Torres-Garcia. Her mother, aunt, and mother's boyfriend are facing charges in her death.

The post DCF releases new details about its involvement with Conn. girl found dead in storage container appeared first on Boston.com.
